title: God that Brioni is nice!
content:
Just a shout-out in appreciation of the beautiful work by Typotheque.

ChrisL
author: dezcom

comments.content: I thought the same thing this morning. Beautiful!
It looks even nicer here than it does on the Typotheque site.

I got the mail piece weeks ago. I could do much with Brioni and Skolar I think. Get the promo piece if you can. It is often that question of what’s not to like. In this case I see nothing. God I sound negative.
You mean the specimen booklet? I got that a while ago too. It's high on my "look at these frequently, and buy as soon as you find a project that may fit" pile. :-)
And is it ever expensive: $145 CDN per style!

And is it ever expensive: $145 CDN per style!

That's just a little over 7 cents a character!
You're comment is about as relevant as mine was, which is probably your point. Sorry I mentioned it!
I do agree... $145 is a lot. I was just being silly posting the per character price. Still 995 characters is also a lot.

Chris is a man with a Brionic eye.  
[insert the Six Million Dollar Man sound here, or a groan.]

For as many pieces of high-tech hardware surgeons have stashed in my body, I might actually qualify :-)

I'll have some Brie and cheese with that!

ChrisL
